name: QNAP TS-464 NAS
description: 4-bay NAS with Intel Celeron N5095 and PCIe expansion. Features HDMI out for direct playback, dual 2.5GbE, and QNAP's QTS with virtualization support.

reviews.review_text: x86 platform enables VMs and containers.
HDMI output great for media center.
QTS takes getting used to after DSM.
